input.sentences: [male] and his girlfriend were at dinner .
they wanted to make it special so they got a delicious steak .
next came dessert | equally as good .
they were both so satisfied and happy at the end .
output.sentences: Tom went to a trendy new restaurant in town.
The steak was the house special.
Hailey, Tom's girlfriend loved the food!
The couple ordered some dessert to end the meal.
They had a blast, getting to know each other better.
